Stephanie is an Urban Planner, Data Analyst, and Smart City Enthusiast with a background in Law. Having lived in Mainland China, Singapore, Hong Kong, UK, and now USA, Stephanie is inspired by a range of urban issues in cities across the world. She is particularly interested in how technology and data can be effectively and equitably used to solve urban and environmental issues. Stephanie most recently worked as the Offshore Wind Intern at New York City Economic Development Corporation, and is passionate about supporting the global shift towards renewable energy.
Samriddhi is currently a Research Fellow at Econsult Solutions’ Center for Future of Cities. In 2024, she received a Master’s in City Planning from the University of Pennsylvania, focusing on cities, data, and technology.

Samriddhi is a current Master of City Planning candidate at the University of Pennsylvania (expected May 2024), with a Bachelors in Architecture from the Visvesvarya National Institute of Technology, India.

:::
